main.head: Real Madrid's 'golden goal': James Richardson's European football papers review - video
main.p: This article is more than 11 years old

AC Jimbo returns after a week off with the best newspaper reaction to the first leg matches in the Champions League semi finals. After his Bayern Munich team went down 1-0 at the Bernabéu there was criticism of Pep Guardiola's tactics, and criticism too for José Mourinho who's parking of the Chelsea bus saw them return to London with a 0-0 draw against Atlético Madrid. Plus: is Silvio Berlusconi about to sell AC Milan?
